channel.title: Game Crash at the end of Office Complex (not the flash light issue)
channel.description:
Hey all! I am having an issue with Black Mesa at the end of Office Complex. Scientist is hanging from a ladder and falls, I continue to climb said ladder, elevator comes down and breaks random boards that were your former walkway, I jump into the elevator via vent, hit the load screen and bam game crash. I have tried to play with settings (shadow effects was my first try, no dice) but I have had no luck so far. Currently running Windows 7 x64.
Any help would be much appreciated!!

item.title: Game Crash at the end of Office Complex (not the flash light issue)
item.dc:creator: brennan909
item.description:
brennan909:

Hey all! I am having an issue with Black Mesa at the end of Office Complex. Scientist is hanging from a ladder and falls, I continue to climb said ladder, elevator comes down and breaks random boards that were your former walkway, I jump into the elevator via vent, hit the load screen and bam game crash. I have tried to play with settings (shadow effects was my first try, no dice) but I have had no luck so far. Currently running Windows 7 x64.

Any help would be much appreciated!!

Problem somehow fixed itself after random tweeking. No idea how it works now!!
